tool_description: An api for various internet request including looking up network speed, dns lookup, network ping get, and webscraping with http get
name: NetConnect Api
title: NetConnect Api

api_list.name: HTTP GET Endpoint
api_list.description: Sends an HTTP GET request to the specified URL and returns a data response. Can be used for web scraping for valuable information

api_list.name: Network Speed Test Endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netconnect-api.p.rapidapi.com/network-speed-test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netconnect-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://netconnect-api.p.rapidapi.com/network-speed-test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netconnect-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
